title: Urrea 9680 Number-0 2-1/2-Inch Shank Amber Handle Screwdriver
features: PHILLIPS DRIVER TIP - Comes equipped with a heavy-duty #0 Phillips tip and 2-1/2" long round shank
HERE'S A TIP - The damage resistant black tip prevents chrome particle shedding while providing maximum torque & efficiency
GET A GRIP - Equipped with a high-endurance transparent fluted plastic handle, and micro-alloy steel shank for maximum durability and resistance
100 YEAR WARRANTY - Pros need tools they can depend on, that's why we offer a 100 year warranty against any manufacturer defect on all Urrea insulated tools and screwdrivers

BUILT FOR THE TRADESMAN - Designed for the automotive professional, maintenance technicians, auto and aviation mechanics, professional contractors, iron workers, heavy machinery, the oil and gas industry and more
description: Urrea offers an extensive listing hand tools designed for the professional. Forged using USA steel and backed by a 100 year manufacturer's warranty these tools are made to withstand the toughest jobsite conditions. So, whether you are a diesel mechanic or service technician look for Urrea to have the right tool for the job.
